mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_oper_log (id, title, method, request_method, operator_type, oper_name, oper_url, oper_ip, oper_param, json_result, status, error_msg ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{title}, #{method}, #{requestMethod}, #{operatorType}, #{operName}, #{operUrl}, #{operIp}, #{operParam}, #{jsonResult}, #{status}, #{errorMsg})
